short_summary: SAP for Sybase Support and Maintenance (or equivalent) Renewal
description: SAP for Sybase Support and Maintenance (or equivalent) Renewal - IRCC - April 1, 2024 - March 31, 2025
full_summary:
### SW-105460 RFQ BPM021316 SAP Support and Maintenance Renewal
#### Government Tender Announcement

#### Contact Information:
* Contracting Entity: Shared Services Canada
* Contact: Sandra Ladouceur
* Phone: 613-302-0766
* Email: [None]
* Fax: 613-960-6026
* Address: 180 Kent Street Ottawa, Ontario K1G 4A8

#### Tender Overview
Shared Services Canada is seeking proposals for the renewal of SAP for Sybase Support and Maintenance (or equivalent) for the period of April 1, 2024, to March 31, 2025, with two optional one-year period extensions. The procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Required Documents
Bidders must submit their bids through the SSC P2P portal by the closing date and time indicated on the bid solicitation. The P2P portal allows bidders to view and access solicitations, submit responses, receive updates, and submit invoices. To register, visit https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca and click on "Register Now".

#### Tender Requirements
* The Service Provider shall provide SAP for Sybase Support and Maintenance (or equivalent) to meet the needs of Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada.
* The Service Provider shall provide two optional one-year extension periods, exercisable at the end of each contract period.
* The Service Provider shall provide acknowledgement and release clauses as part of the contract terms.

#### Evaluation Criteria
* Service Provider's experience in providing SAP for Sybase Support and Maintenance (or equivalent).
* Service Provider's ability to meet the needs of Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada.
* Pricing and value for money.

#### Tender Closing Date
The tender closing date is May 7, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST.

#### Attachment
The tender document is available for download at https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca.

#### Note
Bidders must meet all the requirements outlined in the tender document to be considered for the contract. The Government of Canada reserves the right to cancel or modify the tender at any time without notice. I
 hope this revised version gives you what you were looking for.
